Akcija v Mariboru, evakuacija zaradi pol tone težke ameriške bombe
Prebivalstvo s 300-metrskega območja okoli lokacije bo treba evakuirati. Tisti, ki živijo na razdalji 300–600 metrov od lokacije, pa bodo morali biti med intervencijo v svojih prostorih.
03 Nov 2019, 06:13 by A. L.
MARIBOR – Danes bo v Mariboru potekala onesposobitev še druge ameriške bombe, ki je težka pol tone. Prvo, 250-kilogramsko, so uspešno odstranili pred dnevi.Prebivalstvo s 300-metrskega območja okoli lokacije bo treba evakuirati. Tisti, ki živijo na razdalji 300–600 metrov od lokacije, pa bodo morali biti med intervencijo v svojih prostorih. Nevarnost bo naznanila okoli 12. ure sirena, prav tako pa se bo oglasila, ko bo nevarnosti konec.Med današnjo intervencijo dezaktiviranja letalske bombe v Plinarniški ulici bo evakuacijsko sprejemališče za tiste, ki se nimajo možnosti kam umakniti, Dvorana Tabor. Vstop bo na vhodu B, vse občane bodo ob prihodu popisali.Do Dvorane Tabor se bodo lahko občani z nevarnega območja (radij 300 metrov okoli kraja intervencije) pripeljali s svojimi avtomobili ali z avtobusi mestnega prometa. Ti bodo vozili z Mlinske ulice (postajališče na zunanji strani avtobusne postaje) med 8. in 10. uro.Bolnim in starejšim bodo pri evakuaciji pomagale ekipe Nujne medicinske pomoči Zdravstvenega doma Maribor. Za prevoz se dogovorite na številki 112.Vozila, ki so parkirana na ulici na območju 600-metrske cone, bo treba umakniti na varno, sporočajo iz Mestne občine Maribor.
text:
Action in Maribor, evacuation due to a half ton heavy American bomb
Population from the 300-meter area around the site will need to be evacuated. However, those living within 300-600 meters of the location will need to be on their premises during the intervention.
03 Nov 2019, 06:13 by A.L.
MARIBOR - Another US bomb weighing half a tonne will be disarmed in Maribor today. The first, 250 pounds, was successfully removed days ago. Population from the 300-meter area around the site will need to be evacuated. However, those living within 300-600 meters of the location will need to be on their premises during the intervention. The danger will be announced at about 12 o'clock and the buzzer will sound when the dangers are over. During today's air bomb disarmament intervention on Plinarnica Street, the Tabor Hall will be an evacuation shelter. Entrance will be at entrance B, all citizens will be census on arrival. Citizens from the danger area (300 meters around the intervention site) can drive to the Tabor Hall by their cars or city buses. They will be driven from Mlinska ulica (a bus stop on the outside of the bus station) between 8am and 10am. Arrange the number 112. Vehicles parked on the street in the 600-meter zone will have to be removed safely, according to the Municipality of Maribor.
